data.title: Bellevue College American Sign Language Club :: Student Engagement Organizations
data.text:
Happy Summer Quarter, Bulldogs! Our office operates on the campus summer schedule of 7:30 AM – 5 PM, Monday – Thursday (closed Fridays). The Student Business Center is open 8 AM – 5 PM, Monday – Thursday.

Bellevue College American Sign Language Club

Club Contact: Dashiell Pinck

Club Contact Email: dash.pinck@bellevuecollege.edu

Advisor Name: Richard Mangan

Advisor Email: rmangan@bellevuecollege.edu

A space for students with a desire to develop their sign language skills and connect with the Deaf community around Bellevue College and the greater Seattle area. The ASL Club aims to nurture interest in ASL & Deaf culture/history.
